title: Profile
quote: Set your goals high and don't stop until you get there.
author: Bo Jackson

content.content: I am a full stack software developer.
I am a senior programmer with good knowledge in all the software layers.
I love logic, structure, efficiency and I also stand for quality.
I love designing software from the ground up, fixing little details and optimizing web apps.
Also I believe in teamwork and its benefits, both in a personal and global levels.
